root: ^Wh...what? Where am I? Who are you?
^"I don't know I just got here myself. Who are you?"

Confusion_Grows: ^I am Rolland...I think. I can't remember much.
Neglected: ^No, wait! I don't know where we are. Who are you?
^"I am me. I haven't implemented individuality yet."
Reassured: ^Oh, phew. Thanks. I'm glad I have friends. I'm getting tired now.
Scared: ^Oh...please don't hurt me. I'll go away now.
Confused: ^What? Are you okay? Stop STARING AT ME.
Normalish: ^Yikes, what about that girl over there?
^"Her? She just says 'Hey' and walks around."
^"Her? I think she's next to be implemented."
Disturbed: ^What the fuck man. I'm gonna have a panic attack!
Terrified: ^What? What is that supposed to mean. Oh, I feel like I'm going to be sick.
Uncaring: ^Huh? You don't even care about being somewhere and with someone you don't even know!?
^"Not really. Just gotta roll with it."
^"To be honest, I just peed myself."
Calm: ^Oh. I guess I can try that.
Disgusted: ^Oh...why don't you take care of that.
